pullRequest.title: Filter internal schemas in Oracle connector

nodes.bodyText:
apex are tables for Oracle Apex (Oracle Application Express)
I think we should leave this
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -71,6 +74,20 @@
 public class OracleClient
         extends BaseJdbcClient
 {
+    private static final Set<String> INTERNAL_SCHEMAS = ImmutableSet.<String>builder()
+            .add("information_schema")
+            .add("apex_040000")

nodes.bodyText:
Introduce a filterSchema method in BaseJdbcClient, so that you need to override only that, instead of whole listSchemas.
Use this new method in io.prestosql.plugin.jdbc.BaseJdbcClient#getTableNames too.
(This could solve #3831 as well)
see io.prestosql.plugin.hive.HiveMetadata#filterSchema

commit.message:
Filter internal schemas in Oracle connector

Additionally, drop apex_040000 to fasten tests.

afterCommit.message:
Filter internal schemas in Oracle connector

Additionally, drop apex_040000 to fasten tests.
